title: 'I am not a racist': Woman who started Haitian rumor regrets how 'it just exploded'
content: Erika Lee, the woman whose Facebook post became the source of the rumors that Haitian immigrants were eating cats and dogs, said she's not racist and she never thought that her post would gain so much traction landing up at Donald Trump's table. She said she herself is mixed race and a member of the LGBTQ community and her daughter is half-black.
summary: Erika Lee, the woman whose Facebook post became the source of the rumors that Haitian immigrants were eating cats and dogs, said she's not racist and she never thought that her post would gain so much traction landing up at Donald Trump's table. She said she herself is mixed race and a member of the LGBTQ community and her daughter is half-black.

title: 'This plane is going down': California man shouts on plane, threatens to kill everyone
content: Charles Angel Salva from California said he assaulted the crew because he did not want anyone to know that he was a pedophile. He said he molested his own child and lost the custody rights. He pulled the chain of the Frontier Airlines because he wanted the plane to crash. He felt that everyone on the flight wanted him to admit to his crime.
summary: Charles Angel Salva from California said he assaulted the crew because he did not want anyone to know that he was a pedophile. He said he molested his own child and lost the custody rights. He pulled the chain of the Frontier Airlines because he wanted the plane to crash. He felt that everyone on the flight wanted him to admit to his crime.

title: Bill Maher versus Laura Loomer over 'arranged relationship' with Trump
content: Bill Maher said Laura Loomer looks like she's Donald Trump's type and wondered whether there is any arranged relationship between Donald Trump and Laura Loomer to affect thhe 2024 election. Laura Loomer accused Bill of defaming her and said she should sue Bill Maher for her character assassination campaign. She said she's a private citizen and an investigative journalist but is being targeted by the Democrats.
summary: Bill Maher said Laura Loomer looks like she's Donald Trump's type and wondered whether there is any arranged relationship between Donald Trump and Laura Loomer to affect thhe 2024 election. Laura Loomer accused Bill of defaming her and said she should sue Bill Maher for her character assassination campaign. She said she's a private citizen and an investigative journalist but is being targeted by the Democrats.

title: Abdelmadjid Tebboune secures second term as Algeria's president with 84.3 percent votes
content: Abdelmadjid Tebboune secured a second term as Algeria's president with 84.3 percent of the vote, according to final results announced by the Constitutional Court. The election had a turnout of 46.1 percent among over 24 million registered voters. Rival candidates challenged the results, alleging irregularities and fraud in the vote count.
summary: Abdelmadjid Tebboune secured a second term as Algeria's president with 84.3 percent of the vote, according to final results announced by the Constitutional Court. The election had a turnout of 46.1 percent among over 24 million registered voters. Rival candidates challenged the results, alleging irregularities and fraud in the vote count.

title: Laura Loomer says she's targeted as she broke the story of Kamala Harris' husband's affair
content: That Doug Emhoff's marriage with Kerstin ended because of Doug's extra-marital affair is not unknown. Laura Loomer said she broke the news and hence now she's being targeted for just saying that the White House will smell of curry if Kamala Harris is elected the president. "It's a bit overblow," Laura Loomer said after Donald Trump issued a statement on Laura and strategically exited the controversy.
summary: That Doug Emhoff's marriage with Kerstin ended because of Doug's extra-marital affair is not unknown. Laura Loomer said she broke the news and hence now she's being targeted for just saying that the White House will smell of curry if Kamala Harris is elected the president. "It's a bit overblow," Laura Loomer said after Donald Trump issued a statement on Laura and strategically exited the controversy.

title: Former Kuwaiti prime minister Sheikh Jaber Mubarak Al Sabah dies at 82
content: Sheikh Jaber Mubarak Al Hamad Al Mubarak Al Sabah, former Prime Minister of Kuwait, passed away at the age of 82. Born in 1942, he held numerous key roles including ministerial positions and served as Prime Minister from November 2011 until his resignation in 2019. He significantly influenced Kuwait's governance during his tenure.
summary: Sheikh Jaber Mubarak Al Hamad Al Mubarak Al Sabah, former Prime Minister of Kuwait, passed away at the age of 82. Born in 1942, he held numerous key roles including ministerial positions and served as Prime Minister from November 2011 until his resignation in 2019. He significantly influenced Kuwait's governance during his tenure.

title: How Montreal by-polls can deal a blow to faltering support for Canadian PM Justin Trudeau
content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau faces significant pressure as his Liberal Party readies for a crucial by-election in Montreal. Polls indicate a close contest with Bloc Québécois and NDP candidates. Internal party tensions and falling approval ratings compound the challenges. The by-election result could be pivotal for the party's prospects in the upcoming general election.
summary: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau faces significant pressure as his Liberal Party readies for a crucial by-election in Montreal. Polls indicate a close contest with Bloc Québécois and NDP candidates. Internal party tensions and falling approval ratings compound the challenges. The by-election result could be pivotal for the party's prospects in the upcoming general election.

title: 'Could cause embarrassment': Brazilian court rejects baby name citing bullying concerns
content: Catarina and Danillo Prímola faced initial rejection from a Brazilian court when they tried to name their newborn Piyé, citing potential bullying risks. After explaining its cultural significance, the court reversed its decision. This case is similar to previous naming disputes in Tennessee and France where courts intervened over concerns of ridicule.
summary: Catarina and Danillo Prímola faced initial rejection from a Brazilian court when they tried to name their newborn Piyé, citing potential bullying risks. After explaining its cultural significance, the court reversed its decision. This case is similar to previous naming disputes in Tennessee and France where courts intervened over concerns of ridicule.

title: Climate march shuts down Hague motorway during police strike
content: Extinction Rebellion climate activists blocked a major motorway running through The Hague on Saturday, their "most disruptive" action yet to protest against billions of euros in Dutch fossil fuel subsidies. Extinction Rebellion (XR) said some protesters planned to take advantage of the police absence to camp out overnight in the motorway tunnels.
summary: Extinction Rebellion climate activists blocked a major motorway running through The Hague on Saturday, their "most disruptive" action yet to protest against billions of euros in Dutch fossil fuel subsidies. Extinction Rebellion (XR) said some protesters planned to take advantage of the police absence to camp out overnight in the motorway tunnels.

title: Jailed former Pakistan PM Imran Khan booked for inciting official to mutiny
content: Former Pakistan prime minister Imran Khan has been charged with inciting government officers to mutiny and creating chaos. The Federal Investigation Agency is investigating his social media accounts for posts that allegedly undermine national security. This follows a controversial post comparing past and present military leaderships and urging review of a judicial commission report.
summary: Former Pakistan prime minister Imran Khan has been charged with inciting government officers to mutiny and creating chaos. The Federal Investigation Agency is investigating his social media accounts for posts that allegedly undermine national security. This follows a controversial post comparing past and present military leaderships and urging review of a judicial commission report.

title: Iran successfully launches research satellite, sparks Western concerns
content: Iran launched the Chamran-1 research satellite into orbit using a rocket developed by the Revolutionary Guard. The satellite aims to test space hardware and software. This is Iran's second launch this year, raising Western concerns about potential ballistic missile development, which Iran denies. The launch coincides with heightened regional tensions.
summary: Iran launched the Chamran-1 research satellite into orbit using a rocket developed by the Revolutionary Guard. The satellite aims to test space hardware and software. This is Iran's second launch this year, raising Western concerns about potential ballistic missile development, which Iran denies. The launch coincides with heightened regional tensions.

title: Trump distances himself from Laura Loomer’s racist remarks after backlash: 'I disagree with her statements'
content: Donald Trump defended far-right activist Laura Loomer following her racist comments about Kamala Harris, clarifying she does not work for his 2024 campaign but is a supporter. While distancing himself from her statements, he praised her passion and criticized Democratic leaders during his California tour.
summary: Donald Trump defended far-right activist Laura Loomer following her racist comments about Kamala Harris, clarifying she does not work for his 2024 campaign but is a supporter. While distancing himself from her statements, he praised her passion and criticized Democratic leaders during his California tour.

title: JK Rowling slams Indian-origin trans executive over rape crisis centre failings
content: JK Rowling has condemned Mridul Wadhwa, the former CEO of Edinburgh Rape Crisis Centre, after a report revealed significant failures in safeguarding women-only spaces. Wadhwa resigned following an investigation that found she lacked professional standards. The ERCC board has committed to implementing recommendations to enhance their services and protect women-only spaces.
summary: JK Rowling has condemned Mridul Wadhwa, the former CEO of Edinburgh Rape Crisis Centre, after a report revealed significant failures in safeguarding women-only spaces. Wadhwa resigned following an investigation that found she lacked professional standards. The ERCC board has committed to implementing recommendations to enhance their services and protect women-only spaces.

title: Police fatally shoot man hiding in bathtub in Brooklyn apartment
content: Jean Baptiste, 38, was fatally shot by Brooklyn police while serving a bench warrant. He was wanted for three murders and found hiding in a bathtub with a knife. After an ineffective Taser attempt and an alleged attack on an officer, police used deadly force. The incident is under investigation.
summary: Jean Baptiste, 38, was fatally shot by Brooklyn police while serving a bench warrant. He was wanted for three murders and found hiding in a bathtub with a knife. After an ineffective Taser attempt and an alleged attack on an officer, police used deadly force. The incident is under investigation.

title: ‘If Prince Harry got an ounce of brain, he won’t ... ’: Royal commentator warns
content: Prince Harry's upcoming 40th birthday celebration has raised concerns due to his notorious past. Experts advise caution to avoid upsetting Meghan Markle, recalling his infamous 2012 Las Vegas trip. With Meghan staying home with their children during the festivities, all eyes are on how Harry will balance celebration and family responsibilities.

Experts advise caution to avoid upsetting Meghan Markle, recalling his infamous 2012 Las Vegas trip. With Meghan staying home with their children during the festivities, all eyes are on how Harry will balance celebration and family responsibilities.

title: 'Overwork obesity': 996 work culture causes Chinese woman to gain 20kg in a year
content: Ouyang Wenjing, a 24-year-old from Guangdong province, gained 20kg over the past year due to work-related stress. She cited long hours and irregular shifts as contributing factors. After quitting her job in June, she saw improvements in her well-being. Experts recommend a balanced diet and regular exercise to counteract 'overwork obesity.'
summary: Ouyang Wenjing, a 24-year-old from Guangdong province, gained 20kg over the past year due to work-related stress. She cited long hours and irregular shifts as contributing factors. After quitting her job in June, she saw improvements in her well-being. Experts recommend a balanced diet and regular exercise to counteract 'overwork obesity.'

title: Taylor Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris drives 400,000+ to vote.gov: Can celebrity influence swing US election?
content: Taylor Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris has stirred significant interest and could impact the US presidential election. Her Instagram post resulted in a surge in voter registrations, particularly among young voters. Harris's campaign aims to capitalize on this momentum, potentially involving Swift further in key battleground states like Pennsylvania.
summary: Taylor Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris has stirred significant interest and could impact the US presidential election. Her Instagram post resulted in a surge in voter registrations, particularly among young voters. Harris's campaign aims to capitalize on this momentum, potentially involving Swift further in key battleground states like Pennsylvania.

title: Biden clashes with journalist over Putin's war threat amid Ukraine tensions: 'Be quite'
content: President Joe Biden rebuked a journalist for pressing him about Russian President Vladimir Putin’s warning on Ukraine. During a meeting with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, Biden dismissed concerns over Putin's threat that lifting restrictions on Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles could escalate the conflict into a direct US-Russia war.
summary: President Joe Biden rebuked a journalist for pressing him about Russian President Vladimir Putin’s warning on Ukraine. During a meeting with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, Biden dismissed concerns over Putin's threat that lifting restrictions on Ukraine’s use of long-range missiles could escalate the conflict into a direct US-Russia war.
